This Plugin adds syntax highlighting for SVELTE files

<p style="color: red">If You install Extra Syntax Highlights 2.0 plugin you don't need to install this . Also both doesn't work together</p>

[Github repo](https://github.com/legendSabbir/acode.plugin.svelte)
